item.title: Today, we know more about the Planet Mars than about 70% of our Planet Earth - the worlds ocean
item.description:
Today, we know more about the Planet Mars than about 70% of our Planet Earth - the worlds ocean

Ocean data and insights have been been gathered for decades. But the collected information is only accessible to less than 1% of the worlds population.

item.title: We are looking for team members with a passion for
item.description:
We are looking for team members with a passion for

Join forces to solve one of the last mysteries on our planet - Demystifying the worlds ocean and ensuring a sustainable management of its resources for all Earthlings.Â
